random.text: I am your personal manager Dasha

problem_with_phone.text: Got it, thank you. You can write to this email (support@acmecompany.com) or use our website Support page to submit your issue

problem_with_manager.text: I am very sorry that you are having problems with our manager. I will pass this information on to our administrator.

i_can_do.text: I can help you solve your problems. Such as might pertain to Acme Solutions or our products.

random.text: Could you describe the nature of your problem, please?
Sorry, could you write in other words it again?
Sorry, I didn't quite catch that.
Could you write it one more time?

dont_understand_hangup.text: I'm sorry I can barely don understand you. I'll try to chat with you later! Bye!

yes_i_am_a_robot.text: Yes, I am a robot! Please do not tell anybody about this or I get fired

first.text: Hello, I`m Daria your personal manager.

random.text: What can I help you with?

first.text: Is there anything else I can help you with?

dont_understand_forward.text: I'm sorry, let me transfer you to another agent. Please stand by!
